channel.title: Cox regression on Missing Data Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Cox regression on Missing Data Solutions

item.title: Prediction Modeling with the Cox model - all about the baseline hazard
item.description: This post is about the internal and external validation of Cox regression models and how to adjust the baseline hazard function.

item.title: Prediction Modeling with the Cox model - all about the baseline hazard
item.description: This post is about different functions of the survival package, like basehaz, predict.coxph, survfit, termplot, what kind of results they provide and how they are calculated.

item.title: External validation of a Cox prognostic model
item.description: This blog shows how to externally validate a Cox regression prognostic model according to all steps in the paper of Royston & Altman. R code available.
